Package repository

Class AppointmentOutcomeRecordRepository

java.lang.Object
repository.Repository
repository.AppointmentOutcomeRecordRepository
public class AppointmentOutcomeRecordRepository extends Repository
Repository class for managing AppointmentOutcomeRecord data, including loading and saving data to a CSV file. This repository maintains a HashMap where each key is a patient ID, and the corresponding value is a list of appointment outcome records for that patient.

    • loadAppoinmentOutcomeRecordsFromCSV

      public static void loadAppoinmentOutcomeRecordsFromCSV(String fileName, HashMap<String,ArrayList<AppointmentOutcomeRecord>> patientOutcomeRecords)
      Loads appointment outcome records from the specified CSV file, creating an empty file if it does not exist. Records are added to the provided HashMap.
      Parameters:
      fileName - the name of the CSV file to load from
      patientOutcomeRecords - the HashMap to store the loaded records
